items.name: The Iron Fortress
explicitMods: +1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 50 Strength
Chance to Block Spell Damage is Unlucky

Physical Damage per 10 Strength
flavourText: "Stand steadfast in the face of destruction.
The Council cannot afford to falter."

However, after being fed, he began to poison everything he touched..."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.

You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, taunting nearby enemies to attack the user and exerting subsequent attacks. Grants a buff which boosts critical strike chance and allows attacks to benefit from increases to spell damage.

Buff grants 10% increased Critical Strike Chance per 5 power, up to a maximum of 30%
Buff makes Increases and Reductions to Spell Damage also apply to Attacks at 25% of their value per 5 power, up to a maximum of 150%

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.
